name: 起点 qidian china dark style
description:
http://www.qidian.com/
起点 2016 大改版...WTF
这是 qidian china 版
暗底 #121212 （#000000太暗）
灰字 #AAAAAA（#FFFFFF太亮）
都是用我个人的 暗底灰字万用 css 模板增写出来的

user.name: akiba9527
user.about:
Dark Background and Light Text
A wonderful extension for Firefox to take care with eyes in general purpose.
https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/dark-background-light-text/
对于 Firefox user，这个 extension 是目前最佳的护眼工具了，适用性相当高。

http://imgur.com/a/K6l3G

Color Value with my setting：
Default foreground color：#AAAAAA (grey white)
Default background color：#121212 (dark carbon)
Default link color：#E0BC2D (yellow orange)
Default visited link color：#AAAAAA
Default active link color：#3399FF (white blue)
Default selection color：#2D2D2D (light dark carbon)
===========FOR CJK USER==========
MacType 1.2016.904.0
http://www.mactype.net
MacType非公式パッチ(DirectWriteの調整)
http://silight.hatenablog.jp/entry/MacTypePatch

Droid Sans Fallback Regular11.0d11 (14.05M)
http://www.fontke.com/font/10782556/

Google Drive
MacTypeInstaller_2016_0904_0.exe
https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B_KSWbyUB7bVRkU1NzE0d2d6SG8
Mactype_ini_Droid Sans Fallback.zip
https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B_KSWbyUB7bVN0MxQk5SM3Z1Qlk
MacTypePatch_1.25.zip
https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B_KSWbyUB7bVMnY2VS1Oa3A5Tnc
===========For Chrome Users===========
CentBrowser based Chromium
https://www.centbrowser.com/
Enable/Disable DirectWrite (Mactype)
Font Style would be much smooth.

additional_info:
an userscript for qidian.com (Firefox and Chrome) My Novel Reader@Greasy Fork
Dark Background and Light Text https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/dark-background-light-text/ 对于 Firefox user，这个 extension 是目前最佳的护眼工具了，适用性相当高。 Default foreground color：#AAAAAA Default background color：#121212 Default link color：#E0BC2D Default visited link color：#AAAAAA Default active link color：#3399FF Default selection color：#2D2D2D
